===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|かい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かい}} {{m|zh|界|tr=kɛj<sup>H</sup> ||boundary}}.

In Buddhist contexts, derived from the {{etyl|ltc|-}} term used as a translation of the {{etyl|sa|-}} term {{m|sa|धातु||layer, stratum}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|かい|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かい}}

# [[boundary]]
# a [[bounded]] [[area]] or [[region]]
# a [[bounded]] [[group]] of [[people]], a [[society]], a [[world]] as a [[social]] grouping
#: Used both as a standalone noun, and in compounds. Use in compounds is more common in this sense.
#: {{ja-usex|自然の'''界'''、自然'''界'''|しぜん の '''かい'''、 しぜん'''かい'''|the natural '''world'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|美術界|びじゅつ'''かい'''|the art '''world'''}}
# the [[border]] [[edge]] of a thing
# {{lb|ja|sort=かい|Buddhism}} the [[category]] of a thing
# {{lb|ja|sort=かい|Buddhism}} the [[world]] or [[realm]] of a thing
# [[line]]s drawn between the lines of a text, as on lined writing paper
# [[line]]s drawn to lay out a draft of a piece of artwork: a [[sketch]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=かい|biology|taxonomy}} a [[kingdom]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=かい|geology}} a [[stratum]] corresponding to a [[geologic]] [[age]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|世界|せかい}}: [[world]]; [[land]], [[realm]]
* {{ja-r|結界|けっかい}}: a [[cordon off|cordoned off]] [[area]]; a [[barrier]]
* {{ja-r|境界|きょうかい}}: a [[boundary]], a [[border]], a [[limit]]
* {{ja-r|物質界|ぶっしつかい}}: the material world
* {{ja-r|精神界|せいしんかい}}: the spiritual world
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|さかい}}

{{IPAchar|/sakapi/}} → {{IPAchar|/sakaɸi/}} → {{IPAchar|/sakahi/}} → {{IPAchar|/sakai/}}

The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|境う|tr=sakau||to divide, to form a boundary between things}}, derived as {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=さかい}} element {{m|ja|境|tr=saka||division, border, boundary}} + auxiliary verb {{m|ja|ふ|tr=fu}} indicating repetition or ongoing state.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|さかい|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|境}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さかい}}

# [[border]], [[boundary]], [[limits]]

=====Usage notes=====
More commonly spelled {{ja-l|境}}. Derived terms primarily use that spelling, so see that entry for more details.
